title: Ticket #6444: condor_job_router_info crashes if JOB_ROUTER_ENTRIES_REFRESH set
description: If JOB_ROUTER_ENTRIES_REFRESH is set to a positive value, then JobRouter::config() attempts to register a daemon-core timer. If this happens inside condor_job_router_info, this results in a crash. The call to daemon-core needs to be suppressed if m_operate_as_tool is true.
